DOC.detailed_description: Summary : In experiment , investigator test effectiveness two week 20x incentive multiplier AchieveMint user ( ) notify incentive advance , ( b ) notify incentive purpose . The investigator test group show large boost walk two week intervention last behavior change . Information : The experimental condition vary type amount information incentives follow : - Condition 1 - Uninformed : Users receive 20x usual incentive two week , receive email inform incentive program . ( They may find incentive Achievemint platform . ) - Condition 2 - Informed Incentives Purpose : Users receive 20x usual incentive two week , receive email inform incentive ( one announcement incentives begin , one email every two day remind overall incentive program ) . These email contain information incentive purpose incentive . Condition 2 closely resemble `` constant '' condition previous experiment . Roughly initial announcement email go . The reminder email send every two day , however , include information overall program incentive maximize number participant learn incentive program point . Mock-ups email announcement reminder show . Incentives : The investigator ' incentive consist multiplier point offer via Achievemint . Since investigator find investigator ' last experiment constant incentive successful , investigator offer incentive treat participant : 20x multiplier 14 day . Other detail : The detail experiment previous experiment : - Length incentive : investigator offer incentives 14 day . - Post-intervention observation : investigator observe treatment group least 30 day intervention .
DOC.criteria: top 30 percentile active walker To extent possible , give investigator ' target sample size , investigator exclude user enrol investigator ' previous experiment .
